title: kumaran tiruvaDi
sahitya:
kumaran tiruvaDi kai tozhuvAyE karuNainidhi vElan guhan panniru
 kaNNan shUra samhAra kumAran (tiruvaDi kai) ambikai
 shambhu kumAran udAran shingAran


caraNam 1    mangai deivAnai vaLLI maNALan gAngEyan mayil vIran dayALan
 mangaLa rUpan mAlOlan marugan divya sundarAkAra kumAran
  caraNam 2    mOhana rUpan mAmayil vAhan murugan sharavaNan kanda vishAkan
 unnai anbOrum vaNangum anbar nenjam vaLar kumAran
  caraNam 3    cintai shidari tirinduzhalvadEn kandan tanaiyE ninaindu paNivAi kaliyuga deivam pAr en manamE kunru tOrum amarnda kumaran
